articles.content: The NBA is back, and it feels like it was never gone. The 2021-2022 season opened just over a year since the Los Angeles Lakers won the 2020 championship inside the bubble, and only three months afte… [+4761 chars]

articles.title: Catholic Diocese of Spokane weighs in on religious vaccine exemptions - KXLY Spokane
articles.description: Washington State University fired its head coach of the vaccine mandate. Former head coach Nick Rolovich plans to sue, his attorney claims that he was fired from his job for "being devout in his Catholic faith."
articles.content:
Posted: October 20, 2021 7:46 PM
Spokane, Wash. — Washington State University fired its head coach of the vaccine mandate. Former head coach Nick Rolovich plans to sue.
